fields_of_interest: Education and training, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Codecool engage with EU Commissioners, EU civil servants, Members of the European Parliament (MEPs) or their assistants, to represent an interest or position in terms of digital transformation and EU funding and organises events, or forums dealing with EU policies/processes, invitations to which have been sent to Commissioners, MEPs and their assistants or EU officials; in the field of digital transformation and digital gap in EU
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Codecool is a training and sourcing hub for digital skills, such as software development or data engineering. We find, train and match the tech talents of the digital age to company’s needs.  
 
Why do companies work with us? The most common reason we hear from our existing partners, is that we are delivering very high quality students - with growth mindset, great communication and team work skills, who are motivated to learn more. Codecool is not only about technology. We teach our students how to think and how to grow as developers – and as employees. We equip them with both hard and soft skills that are truly valuable, always up-to-date and a real asset to any team. 
  
We solve the problem of IT recruitment for our partners and we provide a future proof career to our students.  Why did we create Codecool? We had one goal in mind: to create the best available coding course in the region by teaching exactly what the market is telling us to teach.
